com.excite.atm.impl

Class ATMImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.excite.atm.impl.ATMImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ATM

    public final class ATMImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements ATM
    Singleton class, to store various denominations of notes, allow withdrawal and display cash balance.
    Author:
    James David

      • withdraw

        public Notes[] withdraw(int amount)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
        The process of dispensing cash and maintaining balance. internally invokes a recursive method to drill down the denominations. And, once a proper result is arrived, note balances are adjusted accordingly and cash is considered dispensed.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:
